footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Skill Talents: Dendro Traveler

fields.name: Foreign Fieldcleaver
fields.value:
*Normal Attack*
> **Normal Attack:** Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.
> **Charged attack:** Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
> **Plunging Attack:** Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

fields.name: Razorgrass Blade
fields.value:
*Elemental Skill*
With a flourish of your blade, you unleash a spray of razor-sharp leaves that go before you and deal Dendro DMG.

fields.name: Surgent Manifestation
fields.value:
*Elemental Burst*
Calling upon the might of the flora all around you, you create a Lea Lotus Lamp. This Lamp will deal continuous Dendro DMG to opponents within its AoE.
